From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia







 Template documentation[view] [edit] [history] [purge]
This template shows energy cost in Wh/$ and $/kWh, adjusted for inflation. It is intended for use on the Comparison of battery types page.  It functions in US Dollars.

Usage[edit]
 value|unit|year
 firstvalue|-|lastvalue|unit|year

value, firstvalue, and lastvalue are the costs in Wh/$ or $/kWh. When specifying firstvalue and lastvalue, it will display a range.
unit can be Wh/$ or $/kWh.
year is the year that the value was valid. The template will automatically adjust for inflation.


The above documentation is transcluded from Template:WhCost/doc. (edit | history)Editors can experiment in this template's sandbox (edit | diff) and testcases (edit) pages.Add categories to the /doc subpage. Subpages of this template.




Retrieved from "https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:WhCost&oldid=708192005"
